trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs object is automatically created and passed to the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs 对象的实例上自动创建并为<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands><xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>事件</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>传递到事件处理程序

trans-unit.source: An inherited class or event handler can use this event to show commands unique to the item, by changing the collection of commands in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 继承的类或事件处理程序可以使用此事件以显示命令唯一到项，通过更改集合中的命令<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> properties with the values of the `item` and `commands` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs>对象，初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A>具有的值的属性`item`和`commands`参数，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of commands in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置集合中的命令<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 最初，该集合为空。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove commands in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加或删除集合中的命令，通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>类</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to access and modify the commands for a single item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object during the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于访问和修改单个项目中的命令<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>对象期间<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: Changes made do not affect the base collection of commands specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object.
trans-unit.target: 所做的更改不会影响为指定的命令的基本集合<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The collection of commands in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的命令<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的命令将显示的列表项。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的命令将显示的的列表项。
